note.p: Death: At his residence in Argyll Street, London (February 1810)

Career: Counting house of a wine merchant, London; set up his own business as a wine merchant, 8 Craven Street, London; Intermediary between Benjamin Franklin, as Minister of the United States at Versailles, and the British Government; Secretary of commission concluding peace with America; neighbour and friend of Benjamin Franklin, in Craven Street, London
